alert.note: Alert for Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 7:35PM CDT until September 25 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lavaca County in south central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 735 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ezzell, or 11 miles south of Hallettsville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Speaks, Ezzell, Vienna, and Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
